ygData.subject: Dragon slaying
ygData.msgSnippet:
Low 40 s is a minimum for a warrior, if you have the save gear, 100 sv fr
and 100 sv mg UNBUFFED is the minimum anyone should walk in against Nagafen
with.
ygData.messageBody:
Low 40's is a minimum for a warrior, if you have the save gear, 100 sv fr
and 100 sv mg UNBUFFED is the minimum anyone should walk in against Nagafen
with. It's not recommended anyone under 46 go in against Nagafen though.
Figure at 42, even with high saves, you will spend most of your time running
away from him or dead from his breath. Every level over 46 is roughly
equivilent to +10 on the saves. Levels and proper classes are most of the
tactics needed on Nagafen/Vox. You want higher level people there so you
have fewer people which equals less lag. You need high numbers of warriors,
clerics, and wizards for a succesful kill. 6-8 warriors, same on wizards, 2
clerics for each tank group (and hopefully a bard) one for each other group,
and one or two each on enchanters and shamans for buffs. The more anything
else you add, the more people will going LD as /shout CHARGE is entered.



Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
